question.text:
State whether the following statements are true (T) or false (F) and choose the accurate option.
(i) Abortions could happen spontaneously.
(ii) Infertility is the inability to produce viable offspring due to defects in the female partner only.
(iii) Complete lactation could help in contraception.
(iv) Creating awareness can help create a reproductively healthy society.

options.text: <math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>

<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>

<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>

<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mtd><mtd><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mtd><mtd><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></mtd><mtd><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>

solution.text: Statements (i), (iii) and (iv) are true. Infertility is the inability to produce viable offspring due to defects in either male or female or both the partners.
